title: President grieved over sad demise of PHC CJ Waqar Ahmed Seth
content:
ISLAMABAD, Nov 12 (APP): President Dr. Arif Alvi on Thursday expressed his grief over the sad demise of Chief Justice Peshawar High Court Justice Waqar Ahmed Seth.
The President in a tweet posted on his social media account said,
“My Condolences on the sad demise of the Chief Justice of Peshawar High Court Waqar Ahmed Seth.
” May his soul rest in peace and may Allah give strength to his family to bear this loss”, he added.
